item.description: #include<stdio.h> #include<stdlib.h> #define SIZE 10 void quick_sort(int a[], int lo, int hi) { if (lo < hi) { int i = partition(a, lo, hi); quick_sort(a, lo, i - 1); quick_sort(a, i + 1, hi); } } int partition(int a[], int lo, int hi) { int pivot, i, j, t; pivot = a[lo]; i = lo; j = hi + 1; while(1) { do ++i; while(a[i] <= pivot && i <= hi); do --j; while(a[j] > pivot); if (i >= j) break; t = a[i], a[i] = a[j], a[j] = t; } t = a[lo], a[lo] = a[j], a[j] = t; return j; } int main(){ int array[SIZE] = {5, 4, 3, 1, -1, -3, 0, 10, 9, 8}; quick_sort(array, 0, SIZE - 1); int i; for(i = 0; i < SIZE; ++i) printf("%d\n", array[i]); return EXIT_SUCCESS; }
